title: TST's Matt and Zack
description:
It's a TST Crew show! Matt and Zack catch up on what they've been driving, drifting, breaking, and fixing. Matt just did a road trip in the new Lexus LX570, and drove the new controversial Lamborghini Urus. Zack fixed his M3 and took it drifting. Lots of fan Q&A, and guess which Xmas car trend Matt hates? 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/ob1YSXt8IbY

Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

NEW SHIRTS!
https://www.blipshift.com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
